Class LoggingWorkerListener

java.lang.Object
net.greghaines.jesque.worker.LoggingWorkerListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
WorkerListener
public class LoggingWorkerListener extends Object implements WorkerListener
LoggingWorkerListener logs every event that it is registered for.

  • Method Details

    • onEvent

      public void onEvent(WorkerEvent event, Worker worker, String queue, Job job, Object runner, Object result, Throwable t)
      This method is called by the Worker upon the occurrence of a registered WorkerEvent. If there is a Throwable, it is logged as an error, otherwise it is logged as a debug message.
      Specified by:
      onEvent in interface WorkerListener
      Parameters:
      event - the WorkerEvent that occurred
      worker - the Worker that the event occurred in
      queue - the queue the Worker is processing
      job - the Job related to the event (only set for JOB_PROCESS, JOB_EXECUTE, JOB_SUCCESS, and JOB_FAILURE events)
      runner - the materialized object that the Job specified (only set for JOB_EXECUTE and JOB_SUCCESS events)
      result - the result of the successful execution of the Job (only set for JOB_SUCCESS and if the Job was a Callable that returned a value)
      t - the Throwable that caused the event (only set for JOB_FAILURE and ERROR events)
